creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund and Gift of funds from the Regis Corporation and the Aimee Mott Butler Charitable Foundation
description: mechanical figurative sculpture with a moving arm holding a hammer
medium: Painted Masonite and cardboard, metal supports, and electric motor
provenance: The artist, Los Angeles; (Paula Cooper Gallery, New York); sold to MIA, 1984.
title: Hammering Man
